content:
The border guards of the Zaya Brigade from the Guard of the offensive reflected the enemy storm in the Bakhmut direction.

About thisinformsState Border Service of Ukraine.

As it is noted, the invaders tried to punch the line of defense of our defenders by the forces of two platoons with the support of tanks, BMP, APC.

“The assault of the enemy is reflected in the joint application of fire damage by the defense forces, as a consequence - 12 pieces of equipment were destroyed and damaged. Phoenix border guards struck 5 pieces of equipment, ”the department said.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the Armed Forces Land ForcesshowedAs our machine gun soldiers knocked out the winged rocket.
title: Defense forces repelled hostile storm in Bakhmut direction
description: The State Border Service of Ukraine informs about it. As noted, the occupiers ...
author: Army Inform
